src.config package

Submodules

src.config.config_loader module

Config Loader Module

class src.config.config_loader.ConfigLoader(config_path: str)[源代码]

基类：object

Config Loader for yaml config files. Update the default config using user config.

参数:

config_path – the config file path

load() → dict[源代码]

Load config file, update the default config using user config. The default config contains default values.

返回:

config in dict form

static update(src_dict: dict, target_dict: dict)[源代码]

update the src dict with target dict. No like the builtin dict().update, this will update recursively.

参数:

  • src_dict – src dict

  • target_dict – target dict

返回:

updated dict

src.config.constants module

This module contains program constants. Including EBNF, config_path, etc.

src.config.constants.EBNF = '\nservice     : step_block*\nstep_block  : step_header step_body\nstep_header : "step" step_name\nstep_name   : CNAME\nstep_body   : command*\ncommand     : assign | speak | listen | branch | silence | default | end | runpy | system\nassign      : var "=" expression\nexpression  : term ("+" term)*\nterm        : var | ESCAPED_STRING\nvar         : "$" CNAME\nspeak       : "speak" expression\nlisten      : "listen" expression ["," var]\nbranch      : "branch" expression "," step_name\nsilence     : "silence" step_name\ndefault     : "default" step_name\nend         : "end"\nrunpy       : "runpy" expression\nsystem      : "system" expression    \n\n%import common (ESCAPED_STRING, WS, CNAME, C_COMMENT, CPP_COMMENT)\n%ignore WS\n%ignore C_COMMENT\n%ignore CPP_COMMENT\n'

EBNF grammar constants

src.config.constants.config_path = 'config.yaml'

config file path

src.config.constants.default_config_path = 'src/config/default.yaml'

default config file path

src.config.constants.log_format = '[%(asctime)s %(name)s %(levelname)s] %(message)s'

logging format
